mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PDT_NO,PDT_CATEGORY,PDT_PRICE,PDT_NAME,PDT_INTRO,PDT_STATUS,PDT_DATE,PDT_DETAIL_IMAGE,EVENT_NO_REF,E.EVENT_SALE_PER, LISTAGG(PDT_THUMB_IMAGE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.pdt_no_ref) OVER(PARTITION BY T.PDT_NO_REF)AS THUMBS FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB T ON(PDT_NO=T.PDT_NO_REF) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON(P.EVENT_NO_REF=E.EVENT_NO) WHERE PDT_NO=#{pdtNo} ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT ,T1.PDT_NO ,MAX(PDT_CATEGORY) AS PDT_CATEGORY ,MAX(PDT_PRICE) AS PDT_PRICE ,MAX(PDT_NAME) AS PDT_NAME ,MAX(PDT_STATUS) AS PDT_STATUS ,MAX(PDT_DATE) AS PDT_DATE ,MAX(EVENT_NO_REF) AS EVENT_NO_REF ,MAX(EVENT_SALE_PER) AS EVENT_SALE_PER ,MAX(THUMBS) AS THUMBS ,MAX(Z.Z_CNT) AS ZZIM_COUNT ,MAX(R.R_CNT) AS REVIEW_COUNT ,MAX(ROUND((R_AVG),1)) AS AVG ,MAX(NEW_YN) AS NEW_YN FROM ( SELECT P.PDT_NO ,PDT_CATEGORY ,PDT_PRICE ,PDT_NAME ,PDT_STATUS ,PDT_DATE ,EVENT_NO_REF ,E.EVENT_SALE_PER ,LISTAGG(PDT_THUMB_IMAGE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY PDT_THUMB_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY PDT_NO)AS THUMBS ,CASE WHEN SYSDATE-PDT_DATE>7 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS NEW_YN FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB ON(P.PDT_NO=PDT_NO_REF) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON(P.EVENT_NO_REF=E.EVENT_NO) ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PDT_NO, COUNT(*) AS Z_CNT FROM ZZIMCONTENT GROUP BY PDT_NO) Z ON(T1.PDT_NO=Z.PDT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PDT_NO, COUNT(*) AS R_CNT, AVG(REV_SCORE) AS R_AVG FROM REVIEW WHERE REV_DELETE_YN='N' GROUP BY PDT_NO) R ON(T1.PDT_NO=R.PDT_NO)
AND PDT_CATEGORY IN #{pdtCategory}
AND EVENT_NO_REF IS NOT NULL AND EVENT_SALE_PER > 0
AND PDT_CATEGORY IN
#{category}
AND PDT_STATUS='Y'
AND PDT_PRICE BETWEEN #{fromPrice} AND #{toPrice}
OR (R_AVG BETWEEN 0 AND 1)
OR (R_AVG BETWEEN 1 AND 2)
OR (R_AVG BETWEEN 2 AND 3)
OR (R_AVG BETWEEN 3 AND 4)
OR (R_AVG BETWEEN 4 AND 5)
GROUP BY T1.PDT_NO
ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC
ORDER BY ZZIM_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY CASE WHEN EVENT_SALE_PER>0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
ORDER BY PDT_PRICE
ORDER BY PDT_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY CASE WHEN AVG IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
SELECT PDT_NO, PDT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PDT_NO=#{pdtNo} AND PDT_DATE>SYSDATE-7

SELECT DISTINCT P.PDT_NO,PDT_CATEGORY,PDT_PRICE,PDT_NAME,PDT_STATUS,PDT_DATE,EVENT_NO_REF,E.EVENT_SALE_PER, LISTAGG(PDT_THUMB_IMAGE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY pdt_no_ref) OVER(PARTITION BY PDT_NO_REF)AS THUMBS FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB ON(P.PDT_NO=PDT_NO_REF) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON(P.EVENT_NO_REF=E.EVENT_NO)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZZIMCONTENT WHERE PDT_NO=#{pdtNo}
